tab1.text1:
Check out TECArk's Discord for updates or any information regarding the server!

For Xbox/Playstation Players to access the store online

Access website (Link is down below on Welcome UI)
Top Right Corner click login
Log in with eipc
Go to setting
scroll down to connect accounts
In-Game type in global chat !getconnectcode
then type in the code in the website to connect your xbox account to the website
Then that is it! You can now claim your free kits and donate to the server!

tab2.text1:
1. You must respect all users, regardless of your liking towards them. Treat others the way you want to be treated.

2. The use of profanity should be kept to a minimum. However, any derogatory language towards any user is prohibited.

3. We do not tolerate any kind of advertisements, whether it be for other communities or streams. You can post your content in the media channel (Discord) if it is relevant and provides actual value (Video/Art).

4. No offensive character names.

5. Threats to other users of DDoS, Death, DoX, abuse, and other malicious threats are prohibited and disallowed.

6. The Admins and Mods will Kick/Ban per discretion. If you feel mistreated DM an Admin on Discord and we will resolve the issue.

7. Your presence in this server implies accepting these rules, including all further changes. These changes might be done at any time without notice, it is your responsibility to check for them.
tab2.text2:
Game Mode: PvP

Harvest Rate: 25x

Dinos Spawn Max Level: 300
tab2.text4: No Banned Dinos/Items have been entered
